oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Total synthesis of the bacillosamine containing alpha-L-serine linked trisaccharide of Neisseria meningitidis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: EMMADI, M
KULKARNI, SS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Neisseria meningitides
Stereoselective glycosylation
Aminoacid coupling
Rare sugars
Nucleophilic displacement of triflates
SUGAR BUILDING-BLOCKS
DE-NOVO SYNTHESIS
INTERMOLECULAR AGLYCON TRANSFER
D-FUCOSAMINE
STREPTOCOCCUS-PNEUMONIAE
REPEATING UNIT
RARE-SUGAR
GENETIC-CHARACTERIZATION
GLYCOSYLATION CONDITIONS
MENINGOCOCCAL DISEASE
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Total synthesis of the bacillosamine containing L-serine linked O-trisaccharide of Neisseria meningitidis is described. The synthesis entails installation of two consecutive alpha-linkages including the coupling of bacillosamine with L-serine derivative. (C) 2014 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
